Author

Danijel Maksic

Danijel Maksic is a programmer based in Serbia who likes to write about history. He's most interested in learning about military history, since its inception to modern times.

Danijel also writes about various cultures thoughout history, with main focus on Europe and Near East. He currently writes about the kingdoms of the Old World, their culture and figures that shaped the history.
